flawed_nl_solution:

So the lens cost 300-60=$<<300-60=240>>240
That means he saves 240-220=$<<240-220=18>>18 by buying the cheaper lens

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 18. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
